tool_description: Identifies the primary language of text content to enable language-specific analysis and filtering.
error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text for language detection.
Text too short: Minimum 3 characters required for reliable detection.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
usage: Input text_content for analysis. Set min_confidence to control detection reliability. Use results to determine if language-specific models should be applied.

primary_language.description: ISO 639-1 language code of detected primary language

supported_for_analysis.description: Whether the detected language is supported for content analysis
